name: Angel Danger: Chromablast
description:
Help this little angel to catch all the lost souls in the mazes of the Death Realm. 

With the Chromablast weapon, you can change the color of the gun and your hair to gain new abilities. Try combinations to learn how every color works.
KNOWN BUGS:
-if you go to the main menu to restart the run, you can't collect the colors again.

-You have to press scape in the main menu to exit the game.

-For some reason (?) we can't build it in web play.

Controls:

Left and Right movement: Left/Right direction arrows.

Interact: Down/Up arrows.

Jump: ‘Z’

Attack: ‘X’

Dash: ‘C’

Change hair color: ‘A’

Change shoot color: ‘D’

****HINTS-DON'T READ IF YOU WANT TO EXPERIMENT***

Yellow: Do damage.

Blue: Gives you an extra jump.

Red: Gives you the Dash ability.

You have to shoot a portal with the complementary color to open it.
